item.title: Rob Reiner’s son, Nick Reiner, faces 1st-degree murder charges: DA
item.description: Nick Reiner is accused of killing his parents, renowned director Rob Reiner and his wife Michele Singer.

item.title: Doctor sentenced to 8 months home confinement in Matthew Perry death case
